messages: you're my first thought when i wake up
your smile is my favorite sight in the whole world
thank you for being the most amazing pookie
i'm so grateful to have you by my side through everything
every love song reminds me of you
i could listen to you yap for hours and never get bored
i love how you remember the little things that matter to me
i hate moving but i'd walk a thousand miles for you
you're my favorite hello and hardest goodbye
i love how we can communicate without even saying a word
